name: TheSpectrum,StGeorge
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Your Spectrum NewsFlash Briefing will keep you informed 24/7 with the latest breaking news and headlines happening in your area. Staying informed on News, Sports, Entertainment, Technology, Travel and Money has never been this quick, easy, or enjoyable.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
